experience.title: Senior Finance Executive
experience.description: 👉To understand various asset classes,  products & services which are suitable according to economic cycle 👉To track and update the portfolio holdings across various asset classes on a regular basis👉To particularly look after the pooled investments segment to quarterly review the respective portfolio with fund managers👉To analyse macroeconomic factors affecting the asset allocation decisions 👉To continuously track macro stance related to -WPI, CPI, GDP, MPC & FOMC meetings👉To research, investigate and update about various financial market movements with focus on Indian stock markets across sectors new companies, industries, and different cap enterprises👉To port various investment performance reports and summaries👉To analyse the reports and evaluate the portfolio and fund manager performance👉To coordinate with seasoned portfolio managers about portfolio holdings👉To prepare the MIS reports in the specified formats👉To conduct and assist in business development activities
experience.description_html: 👉To understand various asset classes, products & services which are suitable according to economic cycle 👉To track and update the portfolio holdings across various asset classes on a regular basis👉To particularly look after the pooled investments segment to quarterly review the respective portfolio with fund managers👉To analyse macroeconomic factors affecting the asset allocation decisions 👉To continuously track macro stance related to -WPI, CPI, GDP, MPC & FOMC meetings👉To research, investigate and update about various financial market movements with focus on Indian stock markets across sectors new companies, industries, and different cap enterprises👉To port various investment performance reports and summaries👉To analyse the reports and evaluate the portfolio and fund manager performance👉To coordinate with seasoned portfolio managers about portfolio holdings👉To prepare the MIS reports in the specified formats👉To conduct and assist in business development activities

recommendations: Aditi Vaswani “Muskaan has always been a very enthusiastic and active part of the team. She performed all the tasks assigned to her on time and with perfection. She helped other team members whenever they required any assistance. It was a great experience working with her!”

Rhea Sharma “Muskaan is the most kind hearted girl i have come across. She believes in continuous learning and development which greatly contributes to her work and also herself. She is also very proactive, determined and focused.”
